title: RP instead of IP
body:
Hey I wanted to know if it's possible to refund my purchase , I bought Xin Zhao with RP for instead of IP .. he costs me 585 RP instead of 1400 IP -.- 
ps: I don't have refunds on my account sadly so I'm asking if theres another way to fix this issue

replies.body:
Unfortunately, there's not another way to refund this purchase since you're out of tokens. Those tokens are the only exception to our [*No Refund Policy*](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ), which is why I recommend saving them for times where you *really need to use them*. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
